LOCALE_DUPLICATE_BONUS: You've already discovered this bonus word!
LOCALE_BONUS_WORDS_DESC: Find more new words to collect coins!
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_DESC: Tap and drag to select letters and spell words. Find all the words to complete the level!
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_DESC_PC: Click and hold your left mouse button, and drag your mouse to the letters to spell your words. Release the button to complete your words.
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_1_1: Swipe the word %word% to add it to the board.
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_2_1: If you get stuck, try tapping the shuffle or hint button!
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_3_1: Bonus words are valid words, which aren't a solution to the level.
LOCALE_TUTORIAL_3_2: Find Bonus Words to get free coins!
LOCALE_LEADERBOARD_PLAY: Play with friends to earn extra coins!
LOCALE_DAILY_INVITE: Invite friends to get more bonus coins!
LOCALE_DAILY_DESCRIPTION: You just won %Amount% bonus coins for playing today!
LOCALE_INVITE_DESCRIPTION: Invite your friends to Word Showdown, and get 100 coins each time they accept!
LOCALE_GIFT_SENT_MESSAGE: You just sent %Amount% gold to each of your friends!
LOCALE_GIFT_RECEIVED_MESSAGE: You just received %Amount% gold from your friends!
LOCALE_INVITE_MESSAGE: You just received %Amount% coins for accepted invites!
LOCALE_REQUIRED_LENGTH: Try finding words that match the required word length!
LOCALE_NOT_AUTHORIZED:
You must authorize Word Zen before you can start playing. 
Click the button to authorize!
LOCALE_GDPR_1: To provide our games to you, we use mobile identifiers and similar data.
LOCALE_GDPR_2: This data is used for the purpose of serving targeted advertisements in the game, and to provide the developers with important user feedback and bug reports.
LOCALE_GDPR_3: To continue playing, please confirm that you have read and accepted our terms of service and privacy policy.
LOCALE_GDPR_4: We value your privacy! You can  view our privacy policy below, or change your data processing consent settings.
LOCALE_PURCHASE_FAIL: Purchase failed, you have not been charged.
LOCALE_VIDEO_UNAVAILABLE: Rewarded video not available, please try again later.
LOCALE_ASK_MESSAGE: Hey, help me solve this puzzle, I'm stuck!
